item.title: A momentous week as Syria celebrates lifting U.S. sanctions and a year without Assad
item.description: As they mark the first anniversary of toppling Bashar al-Assad's regime, Syrians also celebrate another coming milestone: the lifting of sanctions, which could help give the country a new start.

item.title: Germany's train service is one of Europe's worst. How did it get so bad?
